name: Verify filtering dishes by dish type
fullName: Dishes API Testing: Verify filtering dishes by dish type
description:
As a user
  I want to validate filtering, retrieving dishes, and handling edge cases
  So that I can ensure the API handles diverse scenarios accurately.

steps.name: Given  the user is signed in with valid credentials
Given  the user requests dishes of type "InvalidType"
Then  the response status should be 400
And  the response contains "an error message 'Invalid dish type(s). Allowed values: Appetizers, Main Courses, Desserts'"
